HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: The entire process takes seconds – clear, smart, and fully under your control.

1.title: Upload Prescription or Enter Data
1.desc: The system accepts drop types and recommended intervals, based on a fixed medical protocol or your manual input.

2.title: Smart Schedule Calculation
2.desc: The algorithm calculates exact times based on your waking hours, surgery time, and required treatment intervals.

3.title: Quick Manual Approval
3.desc: You verify that all times are convenient – you can change and save personal adjustments before receiving the final schedule.

4.title: Export and Add to Calendar
4.desc: With one click, you can download an .ICS file and add the drops directly to your calendar – or view the weekly schedule in the app.

1.q: Does the system save my data?
1.a: No. The information is used only for displaying the result and is not saved for personal identification.

2.q: Does the drop time replace a doctor?
2.a: Absolutely not. The tool is designed to help understand prescriptions conveniently, but you should always verify every instruction with your treating physician.

3.a: Printed prescriptions in Hebrew or English, specifically standard eye drops and pills.

disclaimer.title: Important Medical Notice
disclaimer.content: This tool is for organizational purposes only and does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or personalized treatment. The schedule is generated based on general protocols and may not match your specific needs. Your surgeon’s instructions always override this application. This app does not store any personal medical data.

1.content: This application ("The App") is a technical tool designed solely to assist users in organizing general medication schedules based on user-selected protocols. The App does NOT provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The content generated by The App is for informational and educational purposes only.

2.title: 2. No Doctor-Patient Relationship
2.content: Use of The App does not establish a doctor-patient relationship between the user and the developer, owner, or any affiliated parties. The App is not a medical device and should not be relied upon for critical healthcare decisions.

3.title: 3. General Protocols Only
3.content: The schedules generated are based on standard, non-personalized protocols. They do not account for individual medical history, allergies, drug interactions, or post-operative complications. Your specific surgeon’s instructions, prescriptions, and discharge papers ALWAYS override any information provided by The App. If there is a discrepancy, follow your surgeon’s orders.
